content: The EU has 24 official languages: English, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Estonian, Finnish, French, Greek, Dutch, Croatian, Irish, Lithuanian, Latvian, Hungarian, Maltese, German, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish and Italian.
